column4: i'm installing ubuntu.. can i switch the desktop to KDE later?
no howto really needed.  Literally just apt-get install kubuntu-desktop I think is all you'll need.  I did it before once and it was crazy easy
what are you trying to do exactly?  I'm confused.  java is in the repos now  so if you are trying to install it... repos would be a better, faster way I think
just type at a console: sudo apt-get install sun-java5-jdk
